title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1022.4 - Commercial traffic on Henry Hudson Bridge
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1022.4 - Commercial traffic on Henry Hudson Bridge

State Regulations

All commercial traffic, as well as trucks, buses, hearses, trailers, tractors, horses and horse- drawn vehicles, are prohibited from using
the Henry Hudson Bridge. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1022.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
